about_the_game:
In the distant future, the only thing that matters, is power.
Only your wit & firepower can save you in this action packed platformer!

Set in a far flung alternate future where the world's major governments have established a joint world order and mega corporations dictate the world, you play as Maxim Williams, a disgraced police detective-turned private investigator. Maxim must use his skills to uncover the mystery behind his best friend's sudden disappearance, and uncover a broader, more sinister plot occurring behind the scenes.

  • Explore and shoot your way through 6 action packed levels to uncover the mystery!

  • Every shot counts! Target enemy weak points to you advantage by utilizing "short hopping" to line up perfect shots!

  • Use Maxim's adrenaline and dodge projectile shots at the right moment to trigger his "Focus Mode" ability and slowdown enemies around him! Oh yeah, that's got upgrades!

  • With 7 different guns available for purchase, you'll have many options to take out hostiles with the right tools for the job.

  • Buy weapon upgrades that affect damage, fire rate and magazine size of your weapons. Your enemies are tough; You need to be tougher!

content_descriptors.notes: Expect depictions of gun violence, strong language and partial nudity. There's also some body horror.
